advancement.thedesolatedelusion.ash.desc: Get some ashes from burning wood
advancement.thedesolatedelusion.nether_s: Get some nether stars from killing the Wither
advancement.thedesolatedelusion.player_h: Get a player's head from killing a named Snowman by a Witch
advancement.thedesolatedelusion.all_crop: Get all four crops in vanilla minecraft
advancement.thedesolatedelusion.geo_crys: Craft a Geo Crystal from ingots
advancement.thedesolatedelusion.anemo_cr: Craft a Anemo Crystal from apple cider
advancement.thedesolatedelusion.dendro_c: Craft a Dendro Crystal from crops
advancement.thedesolatedelusion.pyro_cry: Craft a Pyro Crystal from lava and blaze rods
advancement.thedesolatedelusion.hydro_cr: Craft a Hydro Crystal from primarine shards and crystals
advancement.thedesolatedelusion.cryo_cry: Craft a Cryo Crystal from ice and snow
advancement.thedesolatedelusion.electro_: Craft a Electro Crystal from Nether Star
tip.thedesolatedelusion.1: Burning planks may be more efficient than burning logs
tip.thedesolatedelusion.2: The wither cannot escape a cage made of crying obsidian
tip.thedesolatedelusion.3: Named Snowmen drop the player's head when killed by a witch
tip.thedesolatedelusion.4: Don't want to run thousands of miles away to collect ices? In many places high altitudes may be as cold as snow biomes
tip.thedesolatedelusion.5: Snowmen now need powder snow and pumpkin heads to be summoned (fake)
tip.thedesolatedelusion.6: Bottled Cloud can be collected between y=300 to 304
